properties.name: trainticket.qps.limit
properties.description: The maximum number of queries per second for the train ticket service.

properties.name: trainticket.qps.server.port
properties.description: The server port number for the decision maker service.

properties.name: trainticket.qps.server.host
properties.description: The server host name for the decision maker service.

properties.name: trainticket.qps.server.interval
properties.description: The interval in milliseconds to update the qps info to the decision maker service.
